caller_intent: Linda requested a certificate of insurance for general liability and workers comp under North Edge Steel, specifically for an installer named Diego Alvarado affiliated with Maria Rubio Lopez's company.
resolution_steps: Cody confirmed the installer's name (Diego Alvarado) and company (Alvarado Installations).
Cody verified the policyholder's name (Maria Del Sol Rubio Lopez) and email address (L.Vasquez@northedgesteel.us).
Cody agreed to prepare and email the certificate of insurance.
knowledge_required: Policyholder and insured party verification procedures
systems_referenced: Alliance Insurance Services internal policy database
summary: Linda from North Edge Steel requested a certificate of insurance for an installer under Maria Rubio Lopez's company. Cody confirmed details and agreed to email the certificate. The call concluded with a resolution to send the document via email.
